ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Xegony Bards needing Epic Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds great to me. We have another 50+ Bard named Tirade. She or I are almost always on since we seem to play opposite schedules (She s East and I m West).
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds great to me. We have another 50+ Bard named Tirade. She or I are
almost always on since we seem to play opposite schedules (She's East and
I'm West).

I'll check the VS boards in the morning,
Tzeetch
The Commune, Xegony

--- Rebecca Small <rsmall@...> wrote:

Tzeetch, Slyde, I was looking for you guys last night. I see why I didn't
find Tzeetch, I could not recall how to spelll the name! Anyways, I was
talking to Kaas about doing the undead bard/Trak. Seems that his guild,
Death Knights has a falling out with SoA (I haven't heard the dirt yet)
and
so they can't field enough folks to finish his epic. We were talking about
guilds and people that he can talk to about helping do his last step. It
dawned on me that he is pretty much in the same boat you guys are talking
about being in. So my question is, would it be possible for the guilds you
guys are in to get involved? I'm thinking we would end up with some DK's,
some Muffins, some Marauders of the Dragon and probably some of my bunch,
Venator Sapentia. I'm sure Kaas's bunch would agree to help you guys do
Gore. Now granted, there's alot of luck involved. The day/time you catch
Gore or the undead bard or whatever red dragon up may not be the day
everyone is on or is free to drop whatever. I would have liked to go do
Trak for Kaas last night if the bard was up but was committed to helping
Annelia and Sybian in Fear with their epics. This has more to do with
meeting more people of the right level and mindset as a start. I'd like to
see all the bards I know get their epics and I will help whenever I can.
We can coordinate via our ezboard if you like. I told Kaas to go start a
thread on our general board but don't see it yet. What do you guys think?

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
